chain_of_thoughts:
Analyzing current market conditions with 4 positions open and bearish market regime. All positions are performing well with positive PnL. SOL is approaching profit target (39.94% to target), DOGE (9.16%), JASMY (3.17%), and LINK (2.78%) are all making progress. 

XRP shows strong momentum with 3m RSI at 73.27 and MACD positive, but volume is below average. 4h trend remains bearish with price below EMA20 at 2.3469, creating potential for counter-trend long setup. ADA presents excellent opportunity with 3m RSI at 66.06, MACD positive, and strong volume confirmation (4h volume 49.7M vs avg 34.2M). Price is breaking above recent resistance with momentum.

Current positions: SOL has strong momentum approaching target, DOGE showing steady progress, JASMY and LINK both in early stages with good setups. Given bearish market regime, will maintain existing positions but consider taking partial profits on SOL as it nears target. ADA presents the strongest new entry opportunity with volume confirmation and technical breakout.

Risk management: Total risk at $15.93 (10.2%), well within limits. Can add one more position while maintaining discipline. ADA setup offers favorable risk/reward with clear technical levels.

chain_of_thoughts:
Analyzing current market conditions with 5 open positions in a bearish regime. All positions are performing well with positive PnL. SOL is 51.95% to target and has been in trade for 66+ minutes - approaching profit zone. DOGE at 13.23% to target with strong momentum. JASMY only 3.17% from target with excellent volume confirmation. LINK at 5.56% to target showing good progress.

Technical analysis shows:
- SOL: Strong 3m momentum with RSI 70.4, MACD positive, price above EMA. 4h still bearish but showing recovery signs. Volume below average but momentum strong.
- DOGE: 3m RSI 63.7, MACD stable, price above EMA. 4h RSI improving to 37.8 from oversold levels. Volume below average but technical setup holding.
- JASMY: Excellent volume (141M vs 105M avg), 4h RSI improving to 34.4, price approaching 4h EMA resistance. Very close to profit target.
- LINK: 3m RSI 67.7, MACD positive, strong momentum. 4h showing recovery with RSI 35.9. Volume below average but technicals solid.
- ADA: Just entered position, 3m RSI 65.5, MACD positive. 4h RSI 34.8 showing improvement from oversold.

Given multiple positions approaching targets and bearish market regime, I'll be proactive with profit taking. JASMY is extremely close to target with excellent volume - should take profits. SOL has good momentum and is 51.95% to target - let it run but monitor closely. DOGE and LINK showing good progress - hold for now. ADA just entered - needs time to develop.

Risk management: Total risk $23.87 (17.5% of portfolio) - well within limits. All positions have proper stop losses and invalidation conditions.
